ygData.subject: Re: Are high-lvl illusions good for combat?
ygData.msgSnippet: yes, i think being human gives you 20% more exp in battle...not certain though and trolls do give you regen ... From: HiFi Review  To:
ygData.messageBody:
yes, i think being human gives you 20% more exp in battle...not certain
though
and trolls do give you regen
